channel.title: Comments on: Kanban – Pulling Value From The Supplier

item.title: By: Robert James
item.dc:creator: Robert James
item.description: Very informative post.. As I am working in a warehouse, your post will definitely help me, as I am not aware of these terms.. I am glad that I came to know about it.. Thanks for sharing..  pallet racks
item.content:encoded:
Very informative post.. As I am working in a warehouse, your post will definitely help me, as I am not aware of these terms.. I am glad that I came to know about it.. Thanks for sharing.. 
pallet racks

item.title: By: Gabriel Schenker
item.dc:creator: Gabriel Schenker
item.description: Very good introduction in some of the terms around lean and kanban! With the sample you give one can easily grook the essence of the theory behind lean sw development
item.content:encoded:
Very good introduction in some of the terms around lean and kanban!
With the sample you give one can easily grook the essence of the theory behind lean sw development
